notableFindings: DL3028 false positive on gem install -v version values
improvements: Fixed DL3028 gem version flag parsing

notableFindings: DL3018 false positive: inline comments in continuations parsed as package names; DL3006 false positive on stage aliases with ARG vars
improvements: Fixed lexer to strip comments in continuations
Fixed DL3006 to skip stage aliases

notableFindings: DL3006 false positive on internal stage names (gobuild, gorun)
DL3001 flags vim/nano in devcontainer (expected for dev images). DV1003 pipe to shell detected. Many DL3008 version pinning warnings.
DV1001 false positive: _FILE suffix ENV vars (Docker secrets file path convention) flagged as hardcoded secrets
improvements: Fixed DV1001 to skip _FILE suffix ENV vars (Docker secrets convention)

notableFindings: DL3001 flags 'mount' keyword in comments about BuildKit --mount. Heavy DL3018 apk version pinning warnings.
